page.title: 12 THE VILLAGE SHOP - WEST ROW
page.content: IN AN AGE WHEN SMALL VILLAGE SHOPS ARE BECOMING A THING OF THE PAST DUE TO THE COMPETITION FROM SUPERMARKETS, WEST ROW IS FORTUNATE IN RETAINING ITS SHOP. SITUATED NOT FAR FROM THE PRIMARY SCHOOL, IT IS REGULARLY VISITED BY THE CHILDREN AND THEIR MOTHERS DURING TERM TIME ALTHOUGH THERE IS VERY LITTLE PASSING TRADE, WEST ROW BEING SOMEWHAT AWAY FROM THE MAIN ROADS. THE PROPRIETOR'S AIM IS TO KEEP THE REGULAR CUSTOMERS HAPPY. EVERY FRIDAY THEIR WEEKLY ORDERS ARE DELIVERED ROUND THE VILLAGE AND INTO THE FEN. AT FIRST GLANCE THE SHOP SEEMS TO SELL ALMOST EVERYTHING. ON ITS SHELVES ARE MOST GROCERY ITEMS, VEGETABLES AND FRUIT, CIGARETTES AND SWEETS, STOCKINGS AND ICE-CREAM. IF YOU NEED A BIRTHDAY CARD, A HEADACHE PILL OR SOME PARAFFIN, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!
